name: Out of Conscience
description:
This game was created for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam. The theme for the jam was "Out of control".

You play as Fred's conscience. You have to help him finish all the mazes in the game by suggesting directions to him. Unfortunaetly no one ever listens to their conscience all the time and Fred will sometimes disagree with you and decide to take another path.

It's all about finding ways to make sure Fred has less ways to ruin your perfect path. Enjoy!
